wines.description: This Virginia red blend from Jump Mountain showcases the state's growing reputation for quality wines with Bordeaux-inspired blending.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromas of black cherry, plum, cedar, and tobacco with subtle oak spice
tastingNotes.palate: Medium to full-bodied with structured tannins, dark fruit flavors, and balanced acidity
tastingNotes.finish: Moderately long finish with persistent fruit and oak notes

wines.description: This white wine from the Sablet area of the Rhône Valley offers fresh aromatics with Mediterranean character.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromas of white flowers, citrus, stone fruit, and herbs
tastingNotes.palate: Medium-bodied with crisp acidity, fruit flavors, and mineral notes
tastingNotes.finish: Clean, refreshing finish with citrus and mineral notes

wineDetails.grapeVariety: Rhône white blend (Grenache Blanc, Roussanne, Viognier)

wines.description: This Washington Cabernet from Two Mountain Winery showcases Yakima Valley's excellent conditions for Bordeaux varieties.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromas of blackcurrant, black cherry, cedar, and vanilla
tastingNotes.palate: Full-bodied with firm tannins, concentrated dark fruit, and oak spice
tastingNotes.finish: Long finish with persistent fruit and structured tannins

wines.description: This Albariño from Rías Baixas showcases Galicia's signature white grape with coastal minerality and fresh acidity.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromas of citrus, white flowers, peach, and saline minerality
tastingNotes.palate: Medium-bodied with crisp acidity, citrus flavors, and distinctive mineral character
tastingNotes.finish: Clean, refreshing finish with lingering citrus and saline notes

wines.description: This aged Toro red showcases Spain's powerful Tinta de Toro (Tempranillo) with considerable bottle development.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromas of dark fruit, leather, tobacco, earth, and spice with aged complexity
tastingNotes.palate: Full-bodied with evolved tannins, dark fruit, savory notes, and tertiary complexity
tastingNotes.finish: Long, complex finish with aged character

wines.productName: Central Valley Banner Day Sauvignon Blanc 2022
wines.description: This California Sauvignon Blanc offers bright fruit with refreshing acidity in an approachable style.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromas of grapefruit, lime, tropical fruit, and fresh herbs
tastingNotes.palate: Medium-bodied with zesty acidity, citrus flavors, and clean fruit
tastingNotes.finish: Clean, refreshing finish with citrus notes

wines.description: This Tuscan Merlot showcases the variety's adaptability to Italian terroir with structure and character.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromas of plum, black cherry, herbs, and subtle oak
tastingNotes.palate: Medium to full-bodied with soft tannins, dark fruit, and Italian character
tastingNotes.finish: Moderately long finish with fruit and earthy notes

wines.description: This South African Cabernet from Noble Hill showcases Stellenbosch's excellent terroir for Bordeaux varieties.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromas of blackcurrant, cedar, tobacco, and vanilla
tastingNotes.palate: Full-bodied with firm tannins, concentrated fruit, and oak structure
tastingNotes.finish: Long finish with persistent fruit and oak notes

wines.description: This powerful Toro red showcases Spain's muscular Tinta de Toro with concentration and structure.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromas of dark berries, earth, leather, and spice
tastingNotes.palate: Full-bodied with firm tannins, concentrated dark fruit, and rustic character
tastingNotes.finish: Long, powerful finish with structured tannins

wines.description: This aged Alvarinho from Portugal showcases the variety's ability to develop complexity with bottle age.

tastingNotes.aroma: Aromas of honey, dried fruits, citrus, and aged complexity
tastingNotes.palate: Medium-bodied with evolved acidity, honeyed fruit, and developed character
tastingNotes.finish: Complex finish with aged fruit and mineral notes
